text.title: Have Great Conversation at Family Dinners

head.s: Have Great Conversation at Family Dinners

p.s: Many sons and daughters have dreaded coming home from either school or work because of the inevitable family dinner conversations .
Who knows , you might end up next to your great-aunt Kate who blabs on and on about her cats or next to cousin Joey who rightfully earned his title of prank king .
Read this article to have an easier time , and you might find yourself enjoying these dinners !

item.s: Consider whether there is some rivalry in the family .
Or , do some people just not fit together ?
If that is the case , make sure they sit on opposite sides of the table !

figure.rend: Have Great Conversation at Family Dinners Step 1.jpg

item.s: Try to steer the mood towards being a happy one .
Who likes to chat with a nemesis for a whole night ?
Also , it might turn out to be dangerous ...

figure.rend: Have Great Conversation at Family Dinners Step 2.jpg

item.s: Sit in a comfortable environment .
Put yourself next to friends and people you have no problem being yourself with .

figure.rend: Have Great Conversation at Family Dinners Step 3.jpg

item.s: Have a corner for children .
It 's very annoying when little kids bug you for the whole dinner , so make sure that they have toys to play with and other kids to scream with .

figure.rend: Have Great Conversation at Family Dinners Step 4.jpg

item.s: Plan the escape .
Inevitably , there are the casualties , so make sure that if you end up with a very boring or annoying person as your side person , that you have an escape .
Some ideas are offered next , to help you .

figure.rend: Have Great Conversation at Family Dinners Step 5.jpg

item.s: Fake a call .
You can say that your friend is in a homework crisis , or be even less confidential and simply say it 's important .

figure.rend: Have Great Conversation at Family Dinners Step 6.jpg

item.s: Say you want to check on your 3-year-old cousin , or in certain cases , your son .
Kids are a great diversion from family dinners , because they need so much care and attention .
Watch out though , you might find yourself spending the rest of the night with little Johnny !

figure.rend: Have Great Conversation at Family Dinners Step 7.jpg

item.s: Use the restrooms .
If you desperately need to go to the bathroom , nobody could force you to stay .
Just make sure you do n't stay away for too long .

figure.rend: Have Great Conversation at Family Dinners Step 8.jpg

head.s: Bring Another Person in the Conversation

item.s: If you are having trouble keeping the conversation going , include someone else .
Group chats can be so much easier and enjoyable , because you can just lay back and listen ( or not ) .

figure.rend: Have Great Conversation at Family Dinners Step 9.jpg

item.s: Make eye contact .
Many people expect you to be making eye contact , so do that .

figure.rend: Have Great Conversation at Family Dinners Step 10.jpg

item.s: Stand up straight .
This basically shows the person respect .

figure.rend: Have Great Conversation at Family Dinners Step 11.jpg

item.s: Do n't be the one to end the conversation if you do n't have a proper excuse .
The person might come back later and wo n't give up until you 've heard it all .

figure.rend: Have Great Conversation at Family Dinners Step 12.jpg

item.s: Be funny .
It is so much more enjoyable to talk to a funny person ! Make jokes and laugh when necessary , but make sure you do n't overdo it .

figure.rend: Have Great Conversation at Family Dinners Step 13.jpg

item.s: Laugh even when you do n't get the joke , it makes people feel appreciated .
Be a good audience .
Nod when you have to , cry when you have to , and even yell if necessary !
The talker needs a confidence booster to keep his or her story interesting on both sides .

figure.rend: Have Great Conversation at Family Dinners Step 14.jpg

item.s: Be polite .
Do n't interrupt unless the speaker asks you a question .

figure.rend: Have Great Conversation at Family Dinners Step 15.jpg

item.s: Find a good topic to talk about .
It 's so much easier to speak if both parties are interested and involved in the conversation .

figure.rend: Have Great Conversation at Family Dinners Step 16.jpg

item.s: Do n't be negative .
Do n't try to see everything at a bad angle , it makes the environment worse for you and the other guests .
Try to enjoy yourself , and most of the time you will .

figure.rend: Have Great Conversation at Family Dinners Step 17.jpg

item.s: Be yourself !
Do n't brag about something that 's not true , because it 's hard to keep up a lie with your family .
Plus , nobody judges or hates you at family dinners , it 's your family !
Do n't be too loud or evasive .
Do n't draw too much attention to yourself , but not too little either , it 's rude in both ways .
